channel.title: Products on Dkron - Cloud native job scheduling system
channel.description: Recent content in Products on Dkron - Cloud native job scheduling system

item.title: Dkron Pro
item.description: Dkron Pro Improved security, features and reliability for your scheduled jobs Buy Get additional features and commercial support from the creator of Dkron Key features Security Pro has enhanced security using industry standard SSL encryption for communication between all components of the application, the embedded storage engine and nodes. You can also enable basic authentication to restrict access to the WebUI and the API.
